EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Today} Subject: Distributor Training Council Announcement
Dear Customer,
Attached is an update from the November Distributor Training Council meeting held in Neumunster, Germany and Nordborg, Denmark.
Sincerely,
Les Mosteller
Cc: Twila Brafford
